title: The tyranny of ideas
author: Nadia Eghbal
dek: Ideas, not people, are the driving force behind societal change.  Creators become vessels for powerful "idea-viruses," often losing control as their creations take on a life of their own, shaping their reputations and demanding constant output.  This article explores the dynamic between creators and the ideas they bring to life, drawing parallels to the obsessive behavior depicted in China Mi√©ville's _Embassytown_.
